/* 
 * File:   main.cpp
 * Author: jc2
 *
 * Created on September 14, 2010, 10:08 PM
 */

#include <iostream>
#include<list>
#include<string>
#include<algorithm>

using namespace std;

/*
 * 
 */
int main(int argc, char** argv) {
    int n;
    char tmp[102];
    list<string> name;

    cin>>n;
    while(n--){
        scanf("%s", tmp);
        name.push_back(string(tmp));
    }
    name.sort();

    int ans=0;
    int i;
    for(list<string>::iterator it1=name.begin(),it2; it1!=name.end(); it1++){
        it2=it1;
        it2++;
        if(it2==name.end())
            break;
        int i;
        for(i=0;i<it1->length() && i<it2->length(); i++)
            if(it1->at(i)!=it2->at(i))
                break;
        ans = max(ans,i);
    }
    cout<<ans<<endl;

    /*for(list<string>::iterator it=name.begin();it!=name.end();it++)
        cout<<*it<<endl;
    */
    return 0;
}
